Description: Rim and wall sherd of black-glazed pottery small bowl with incurving rim; glazed black inside and outside.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Compare Rotroff, Agora XXIX nos. 980-982 fig. 62, pl. 75.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.47 no. D 11 pl. 20.3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.062)
